title.rendered: Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience the Director-General of NAPTIP

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience the Director-General of NAPTIP, Prof. Fatima Waziri-Azi, Ph.D and her team today, 16th June, 2023.
Discussions centred on working out modalities to ensure effective collaboration between relevant Nigerian stakeholders and their international partners in the fight against human trafficking.
